short_desc: Flu shot hotline at 1-800-573-5811 (1-800-KP-FLU-11) provides seasonal flu clinic locations and hours of operation
description: Flu shot hotline at 1-800-573-5811 (1-800-KP-FLU-11) provides seasonal flu clinic locations and hours of operation. Information on the flu shot hotline is updated frequently and provides changes in flu clinic hours.
